price: 27 que mon Seigneur m’a pardonné et placé au nombre des hôtes honorés du Paradis ! »
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
